text:
The right-hand corridor goes only a short distance and then opens out into a large chamber. The double doors at the far end of the chamber glimmer with a dull blue sheen. To either side of you, steps lead up to a balcony.

The most amazing feature of this room is a giant chessboard that has been constructed in the middle of the floor. The chessboard is eight metres along each side, and the pieces are as tall as you are.

A glowing sphere hanging from the ceiling casts a flood of light on this playing area.

choices.text: Go back and take the left-hand passage instead
Go and look at the chess pieces
